pages.text: Use a writable book with differents items and few experience levels to obtain enchanted book with a selected enchantement. Bedrock Enchanter alone is useless, you need Pedestal to put infused item. Enchanter is multi block structure, you can sneak right-click on enchanter to visualise what is wrong.
$(br2)Unfortunatly, Bedrock Enchanter have limit, you can only craft level I enchantement.
When all items required are in Pedestal, apply a redstone signal on Bedrock Enchanter to start infusion
